about_the_game:
Graduate school life begins with full of expectations.

Research, conference presentations, internships, job hunting, master's thesis, and doctoral advancement. ・・・・・・

The days are not always pleasant.
Some drop out, some become depressed, some disappear, and some disappear.
There are many such people.

Please move forward, believing that a wonderful future will surely await you.

▷ This is how the game works.
Players will experience two years in a master's course (Master's course).

Basically, the player chooses what actions to take each day.

However, it is not easy to graduate. We plan to include events that will interfere with the author in that way.

▷ What are parameters/relationships?
Depending on the values of parameters and relationships, changes in endings, occurrence of specific events, and appearance of specific commands will occur.

▷ What is a state?
Various illnesses and abnormal states can occur, such as sleep deprivation, alcoholism, insanity, etc.

▷ Credits.
General / Hanachiru (@hanaaaaaachiru)
Character illustration by Aluminum Hoshino

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS Monterey or later
  • Processor: 1.8 GHz Dual-Core CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

name: Another Master's Student Life

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 or higher
  • Processor: 1.8 GHz Dual-Core CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: A graduate student simulation game that allows students to experience two years of a master's course (Master's course).
